attributes.action: Give children back to their parents with support and stop child abuse within local authority care conducted by staff,foster carers,paedophile rings and the church
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many parents have had children removed because of once being a victim of abuse themselves whether that be domestic violence or abuse in their childhood.Some parents have been wrongfully accused of abuse.These parents then have to sit back with no power and see articles such as foster carers kill child,Paedophile rings targetting children in care,child traffickers targetting children in care.
These protective parents want their children safe and given the current cases of abuse in the care system that can only be achieved by the children returning home and the families being given support.

rejection.details:
Your petition overlaps with others already live on the site which you may wish to sign instead:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/familyfight4kids/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/protectchildren1/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
